articles.title: Here's how many Golf 8 GTIs Volkswagen sold in its first official month in SA - News24
articles.description: The all-new Volkswagen Golf GTI was launched in August 2021, with September being its first full sales month. The people's car found favour with South Africans, again.
articles.content:
• The all-new Volkswagen Golf GTI is now officially on sale in South Africa.
• In September 2021, 125 Golf GTIs were sold in the country.

articles.description: South Africa registered 809 new Covid-19 cases, bringing the cumulative total to 2,906,422. A further 27 Covid-19-related deaths were reported, taking total official deaths to 87,780. A total of 17,875,187 people have been vaccinated.
